english.segment1: Rain is a bad reminder of everything I don't want to know. Rain is a backseat driver that takes me where I don't want to go
english.segment2: And it looks like the sky is caving in again. I'm dry and cracked, the sky goes black. And tut, tut, it looks like rain
english.segment3: Erosion. Oh, Spirit, fall like rain on my thirsty soul. Erosion. Oh, sweet erosion, break me and make me whole
